address.docs:
**, int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x69`.

*See also: [SPS30 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sps30.html#configuration-variables)*

auto_cleaning_interval.docs:
The interval in seconds of the periodic fan-cleaning.

*See also: [SPS30 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sps30.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_10_0.docs:
The information for the **Weight Concentration** sensor for coarse particles up to 10μm. Readings in µg/m³.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SPS30 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sps30.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_1_0.docs:
The information for the **Weight Concentration** sensor for fine particles up to 1μm. Readings in µg/m³.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SPS30 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sps30.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_2_5.docs:
The information for the **Weight Concentration** sensor for fine particles up to 2.5μm. Readings in µg/m³.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SPS30 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sps30.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_4_0.docs:
The information for the **Weight Concentration** sensor for coarse particles up to 4μm. Readings in µg/m³.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SPS30 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sps30.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_size.docs:
Typical particle size in μm.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SPS30 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sps30.html#configuration-variables)*

pmc_0_5.docs:
The information for the **Number Concentration** sensor for ultrafine particles up to 0.5μm. Readings in particles/cm³.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SPS30 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sps30.html#configuration-variables)*

The information for the **Number Concentration** sensor for coarse particles up to 10μm. Readings in particles/cm³.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [SPS30 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sps30.html#configuration-variables)*

pmc_1_0.docs:
The information for the **Number Concentration** sensor for fine particles up to 1μm. Readings in particles/cm³.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [SPS30 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sps30.html#configuration-variables)*
